radiographic_examinations.findings: Focal wall thickening and pericolonic inflammatory change surrounding the upper sigmoid colon, centered around several diverticulae. A small hypodense focus containing a tiny locule of gas measuring roughly 1 x 1 cm, suggestive of contained local microperforation. Marked wall thickening in adjacent loops of small bowel with interloop inflammatory fat stranding. No sign of bowel obstruction and no suspicious osseous lesions.
